help:
> python sdutil app [ *register | *list | *set-trusted | *list-trusted ] (options)
  *register      $ python sdutil app register [appservice@email] [sdpath]
                   register a new application in a seismic store tenant
                   [appservice@email] : email of the application service account to register
                   [sdpath]           : seismic store tenant path, sd://<tenant_name>
  *list          $ python sdutil app list [sdpath]
                   list registered applications in a seismic store tenant
                   [sdpath] : seismic store tenant path, sd://<tenant_name>
  *set-trusted   $ python sdutil app set-trusted [appservice@email] [sdpath]
                   set a registered application as trusted application a seismic store tenant(app must be registered)
                   [appservice@email] : email of the application service account to register
                   [sdpath]           : seismic store tenant path, sd://<tenant_name>
  *list-trusted  $ python sdutil app list-trusted [sdpath]
                   list trusted applications in a seismic store tenant
                   [sdpath] : seismic store tenant path, sd://<tenant_name>
  (options)      | --idtoken=<token> pass the credential token to use, rather than generating a new one
name: app
